newsitem.title: CHINA: Kader Holdings says in share sales talks.
newsitem.headline: Kader Holdings says in share sales talks.

text.p: Kader Holdings Co Ltd said on Monday it was in talks to sell a stake to a third party but that no agreement had yet been reached.
"The company is now in discussion with an independent third party in relation to the acquisition of certain equity interest in the share capital of the company," it said in a statement.
"The negotiation is still in progress and may or may not materialise. It should be stressed that no binding agreement has been reached," the company said.
Trading in Kader shares resumed on Monday after a half day suspension on Friday. Its shares jumped HK$0.435 or 23.02 percent to HK$2.325 in early trade.
